country.country_description: Yorland is a distant planet located in the outer reaches of the universe, with a unique culture and language.
country.people_description: The people of Yorland are friendly, open-minded, and curious about the universe.
country.language_description: Yorlani is a unique language spoken by the inhabitants of Yorland. It has a complex syntax and interesting sound system.
